name: gifted-md
description: I am Gifted-Md WhatsApp MultiDevice Bot built in NodeJs to enhance the experience

SESSION_ID.description: Your session id. Must Start with Gifted~

MODE.description: set Mode  to public or private

SUDO_NUMBERS.description: Put Sudo Numbers separated by comma Here. Sudos are limited to owner commands else leave blank

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it true if you want bot to view status else leave blank

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Make it true if you want bot to read and like status else leave blank

AUTOLIKE_EMOJI.description: Input your custom status like emoji else leave blank to use default => ðŸ’š

AUTO_REPLY_STATUS.description: make it true if you want the bot to send message after viewing status else leave blank

STATUS_READ_MSG.description: set your status reply message to be sent after bot views status else leave blank

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Make it true if you want bot to always read messages else leave blank

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want bot to always show typing else leave blank

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want bot to always show recording audio else leave blank

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if you want bot to show always online else leave blank

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Provide country codes you want the bot to automatically block else leave blank

AUTO_REJECT_CALLS.description: Make it true if you want to automatically reject calls else leave blank

PREFIX.description: Your Bot Prefix (default: .) You can put your own custom prefix
